file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 24-60-03-04 - ESSENTIAL BUS CONTACTOR (EBC) - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ESSENTIAL BUS CONTACTOR (EBC) - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the Essential Bus Contactor (EBC). B. EBC 1 is installed in the left electrical-power control/distribution box. C. EBC 2 is installed in the right electrical-power control/distribution box. D. You can get access to EBC 1 through access panel 223UZ on the left side of the Cockpit in Forward Fuselage Section II. E. You can get access to EBC 2 through access panel 224NZ on the right side of the Cockpit in Forward Fuselage Section II. F. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ESSENTIAL BUS CONTACTOR (EBC) - ALL 24-60-03-000-801-A REMOVAL ESSENTIAL BUS CONTACTOR (EBC) - IN- ALL 24-60-03-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 24-60-03 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-60-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ESSENTIAL BUS CONTACTOR (EBC) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the Essential Bus Contactor (EBC). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223UZ Cockpit - LH 224 224NZ Cockpit - RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit in forward fuselage section II I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the GPU pushbutton, on the electrical panel, on the overhead panel, is in the OFF position (The striped bar is off). (2) Make sure that the BATT 1 and BATT 2 switches, on the electrical panel, on the overhead panel, are in the OFF position. (3) Attach a DO-NOT-SET-ON tag to the GPU pushbutton. (4) Remove the life vest compartment and open access panel 223UZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100) to remove EBC 1. (5) Open access panel 224NZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100) to remove EBC 2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 24-60-03 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove EBC 1 as follows (Figure 401): (a) Remove the four bolts (1) and four washers (2) which attach EBC 1 (3) to the left electrical-power control/distribution box (4). (b) Remove EBC 1 (3). (2) Remove EBC 2 as follows (Figure 402): (a) Remove the four bolts (1) and four washers (2) which attach EBC 2 (3) to the right electrical-power control/distribution box (4). (b) Remove EBC 2 (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 24-60-03 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Essential Bus Contactor 1 (EBC 1) - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONE 223 A B DET. A 223UZ C DET. B 4. C 1 EM145AMM240847A.DGN TORQUE : 1.4 TO 1.7 Nm (13.0 TO 15.5 lbf.in) EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 24-60-03 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Essential Bus Contactor 2 (EBC 2) - Removal/Installation Figure 402 ZONE 224 A DET. A B C 224NZ DET. B 4. RIGHT ELECTRICAL-POWER CONTROL AND DISTRIBUTION BOX 3. EBC 2 2. WASHER (4) 1 1. BOLT (4) DET. C 1 TORQUE : 1.4 TO 1.7 Nm (13.0 TO 15.5 lbf.in) 145AMM240099.MCE C EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 24-60-03 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-60-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ESSENTIAL BUS CONTACTOR (EBC) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the Essential Bus Contactor (EBC). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION ELECTRICAL EMERGENCY TRANSFER CIRCUIT - AMM TASK 24-60-00-700-801-A/500 OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223UZ Cockpit - LH 224 224NZ Cockpit - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench (For the torque range, To torque the fasteners correctly available refer to Figures 401 and 402) E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit in forward fuselage section II I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install EBC 1 as follows (Figure 401): (a) Put EBC 1 (3) in its installation position. (b) Tighten the four bolts (1) and four washers (2) which attach EBC 1 (3) to the left electrical-power control/distribution box (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 24-60-03 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Install EBC 2 as follows (Figure 402): (a) Put EBC 2 (3) in its installation position. (b) Tighten the four bolts (1) and four washers (2) which attach EBC 2 (3) to the right electrical-power control/distribution box (4). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access panel 223UZ or access panel 224NZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100) as applicable. (2) Remove the DO-NOT-SET-ON tag from the GPU pushbutton. (3) Do the Operational Check of the Electrical Emergency Transfer Circuit ( AMM TASK 24-60-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 24-60-03 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
